# Example

```html
<chart-bubble>
    <canvas style="width: 100%;"></canvas>
    <data-source label="{{object.title}}" color="#FF0000" src="/api/tracker/{{object.pk}}/checkins"></data-source>
    <data-source label="{{object.title}}" color="#00FF00" src="/api/tracker/dbe70b55-80fa-453c-8085-6ce9a1e327c6/checkins"></data-source>
</chart-bubble>
```
